thread.title: Heidi Baldwin-Tucker

author: Heidi Baldwin-Tucker
title: Heidi Baldwin-Tucker
text:
very pleasant shopping experience found a few things my size (3x) will see whem they arrive I pretty much only wear leggings day in day out
I used to ride horses we all wore leggings to ride in very comfy
thing I can really use are decent sport bras had a mastectomy 2 1/2 years ago so only have a single can no longer wear a reg bra so will keep checking for those
thank you love the colors and patterns
Heidi Baldwin-Tucker
